title: Osananajimi no Imouto no Kateikyoushi wo Hajimetara Soen Datta Osananajimi ga Kowai (LN) - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Cold Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Popular Love Interests   Tsundere   Younger Sisters
author: Skyfarm   すかいふぁーむ
description:
His childhood friend Takanishi Aisa is a popular beautiful girl even when the two were in school.

It’s not a surprise that they now are estranged.

But, Aisa have only had eyes for Kouki…?

As Aisa’s younger sister Minami’s home tutor, the two once again come into contact.

It’s a romantic comedy about the unfriendly class idol Aisa and Kouki who is afraid of that cold attitude.>
